referenceObject.reference: Polotow, D., Brescovit, A. D. & Pellegatti-Franco, F. (2005). A redescription of Isoctenus coxalis (F.O.P. Cambridge, 1902) comb. nov. and description of I. corymbus, a new species of cave dwelling spider (Araneae, Ctenidae, Cteninae) from the state of Goiás, Brazil.
